entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
